class Solution(object):
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors, k):
        """
        :type colors: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(colors)
        count = 0

        different = [0] * n
        for i in range(n):
            different[i] = colors[i] != colors[(i + 1) % n]
        
        print(different)
        sum_dif = sum(different[:k-1])
        for i in range(n):
            if sum_dif == k-1:
                count += 1
            sum_dif -= different[i]
            sum_dif += different[(i+k-1) % n]

        return count
